verses.verse: Nevertheless <WH3588> the dimness <WH4155> shall not <WH3808> be such as <WH834> was in her vexation, <WH4164> when <WH6256> at the first <WH7223> he lightly afflicted <WH7043> the land <WH776> of Zebulun <WH2074> and the land <WH776> of Naphtali, <WH5321> and afterward <WH314> did more grievously afflict <WH3513> her by the way <WH1870> of the sea, <WH3220> beyond <WH5676> Jordan, <WH3383> in Galilee <WH1551> of the nations. <WH1471>

The people <WH5971> that walked <WH1980> in darkness <WH2822> have seen <WH7200> a great <WH1419> light: <WH216> they that dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the shadow of death, <WH6757> upon <WH5921> them hath the light <WH216> shined. <WH5050>

Thou hast multiplied <WH7235> the nation, <WH1471> and not <WH3808> increased <WH1431> the joy: <WH8057> they joy <WH8055> before <WH6440> thee according to the joy <WH8057> in harvest, <WH7105> and as <WH834> men rejoice <WH1523> when they divide <WH2505> the spoil. <WH7998>

For <WH3588> thou hast broken <WH2865> <WH853> the yoke <WH5923> of his burden, <WH5448> and the staff <WH4294> of his shoulder, <WH7926> the rod <WH7626> of his oppressor, <WH5065> as in the day <WH3117> of Midian. <WH4080>

For <WH3588> every <WH3605> battle <WH5430> of the warrior <WH5431> is with confused noise, <WH7494> and garments <WH8071> rolled <WH1556> in blood; <WH1818> but this shall be <WH1961> with burning <WH8316> and fuel <WH3980> of fire. <WH784>

For <WH3588> unto us a child <WH3206> is born, <WH3205> unto us a son <WH1121> is given: <WH5414> and the government <WH4951> shall be upon <WH5921> his shoulder: <WH7926> and his name <WH8034> shall be <WH1961> called <WH7121> Wonderful, <WH6382> Counselor, <WH3289> The mighty <WH1368> God, <WH410> The everlasting <WH5703> Father, <WH1> The Prince <WH8269> of Peace. <WH7965>

Of the increase <WH4766> of his government <WH4951> and peace <WH7965> there shall be no <WH369> end, <WH7093> upon <WH5921> the throne <WH3678> of David, <WH1732> and upon <WH5921> his kingdom, <WH4467> to order <WH3559> it, and to establish <WH5582> it with judgment <WH4941> and with justice <WH6666> from henceforth <WH4480> <WH6258> even forever. <WH5704> <WH5769> The zeal <WH7068> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> will perform <WH6213> this. <WH2063>
The Lord <WH136> sent <WH7971> a word <WH1697> into Jacob, <WH3290> and it hath lighted <WH5307> upon Israel. <WH3478>

And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall know, <WH3045> even Ephraim <WH669> and the inhabitant <WH3427> of Samaria, <WH8111> that say <WH559> in the pride <WH1346> and stoutness <WH1433> of heart, <WH3824>
The bricks <WH3843> are fallen down, <WH5307> but we will build <WH1129> with hewn stones: <WH1496> the sycamores <WH8256> are cut down, <WH1438> but we will change <WH2498> them into cedars. <WH730>
Therefore the LORD <WH3068> shall set up <WH7682> <WH853> the adversaries <WH6862> of Rezin <WH7526> against <WH5921> him, and join his enemies together; <WH5526> <WH853> <WH341>

The Syrians <WH758> before, <WH4480> <WH6924> and the Philistines <WH6430> behind; <WH4480> <WH268> and they shall devour <WH398> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> with open <WH3605> mouth. <WH6310> For all <WH3605> this <WH2063> his anger <WH639> is not <WH3808> turned away, <WH7725> but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out <WH5186> still. <WH5750>
For the people <WH5971> turneth <WH7725> not <WH3808> unto <WH5704> him that smiteth <WH5221> them, neither <WH3808> do they seek <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>
Therefore the LORD <WH3068> will cut off <WH3772> from Israel <WH4480> <WH3478> head <WH7218> and tail, <WH2180> branch <WH3712> and rush, <WH100> in one <WH259> day. <WH3117>
The ancient <WH2205> and honorable, <WH5375> <WH6440> he <WH1931> is the head; <WH7218> and the prophet <WH5030> that teacheth <WH3384> lies, <WH8267> he <WH1931> is the tail. <WH2180>
For the leaders <WH833> of this <WH2088> people <WH5971> cause them to err; <WH8582> and they that are led <WH833> of them are destroyed. <WH1104>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the Lord <WH136> shall have no <WH3808> joy <WH8055> in <WH5921> their young men, <WH970> neither <WH3808> shall have mercy <WH7355> on their fatherless <WH3490> and widows: <WH490> for <WH3588> every one <WH3605> is a hypocrite <WH2611> and an evildoer, <WH7489> and every <WH3605> mouth <WH6310> speaketh <WH1696> folly. <WH5039> For all <WH3605> this <WH2063> his anger <WH639> is not <WH3808> turned away, <WH7725> but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out <WH5186> still. <WH5750>

For <WH3588> wickedness <WH7564> burneth <WH1197> as the fire: <WH784> it shall devour <WH398> the briers <WH8068> and thorns, <WH7898> and shall kindle <WH3341> in the thickets <WH5442> of the forest, <WH3293> and they shall mount up <WH55> like the lifting up <WH1348> of smoke. <WH6227>

Through the wrath <WH5678> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> is the land <WH776> darkened, <WH6272> and the people <WH5971> shall be <WH1961> as the fuel <WH3980> of the fire: <WH784> no <WH3808> man <WH376> shall spare <WH2550> <WH413> his brother. <WH251>

And he shall snatch <WH1504> on <WH5921> the right hand, <WH3225> and be hungry; <WH7456> and he shall eat <WH398> on <WH5921> the left hand, <WH8040> and they shall not <WH3808> be satisfied: <WH7646> they shall eat <WH398> every man <WH376> the flesh <WH1320> of his own arm: <WH2220>

Manasseh, <WH4519> <WH853> Ephraim; <WH669> and Ephraim, <WH669> <WH853> Manasseh: <WH4519> and they <WH1992> together <WH3162> shall be against <WH5921> Judah. <WH3063> For all <WH3605> this <WH2063> his anger <WH639> is not <WH3808> turned away, <WH7725> but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out <WH5186> still. <WH5750>
